I support the growth of our ERP business lines though the addition of highly professional consultants. They will be experienced at the functional levels.  There will also be a need for technical expertise to support customer needs as well.

Business & Decision is an international Consulting and Systems Integration (CSI) company. It is a leader in Business Intelligence (BI), Enterprise Performance Management (EPM), Data Warehousing, Master Data Management (MDM), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), and a major player in Life Sciences Computer Systems Validation (CSV). In addition, Business & Decision has an FDA Qualified Data Center in the Philadelphia region supported by Managed Services for all industries. Business & Decision contributes to the success of its customer projects by driving maximum business performance. The company has a reputation for functional and technological expertise and has forged partnerships with all of the key technology vendors.Founded in 1992 and listed on the NYSE Euronext, the group has gained its leadership by leveraging its functional and technological expertise to successfully address your organization's most critical challenges. Located in 16 countries, Business & Decision employs 2500 people in France and worldwide.

Working remotely, I support one of our important Steel manufacturing companies in the hiring of Engineering professionals that will be based in several locations throughout the country.  We are supporting an aggressive hiring program.  All of these positions are full time with benefits plus bonus monies.  Here is a little more about us:PeopleScout is a leading provider of recruitment process outsourcing (RPO) services aimed at helping companies with their exempt and non-exempt hiring needs. The firm's suite of services includes RPO, employment branding, on-boarding, and employee retention. Annually, PeopleScout places over 200,000 hires via RPO engagements. Industries served include airline, financial services, telecommunications, retail, utilities, pharmaceutical, and transportation. PeopleScout's clients include some of the more recognizable names in the Fortune 500 list of companies. PeopleScout was recently ranked as a Top RPO Provider in HRO Today Magazine's Baker's Dozen – its fifth consecutive appearance on the closely watched list of industry-leading RPO providers – as well as being named #1 in deal size. The firm also has been recognized as the #1 RPO Provider by The Black Book of Outsourcing on their "Top Ten HRO: Recruitment Process Outsourcing/RPO" list. For more information, please visit us at www.peoplescout.com or call 800-966-4803.
